# `swatanomaly`

Various anomaly detection algorithms studied in *NSR anomaly detection project*

- NND: @Yun:2018di
- K-L divergence: @Cho:2019ji
- SOM

## Installation

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ygeunkim/swatanomaly")
```

```{r}
library(swatanomaly)
```
